entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `DbSet.Count()` in `Select()` lambda not translating to scalar subquery expression #34958
  • SQLServer: ExecuteDelete without Where should translate to TRUNCATE TABLE #34957
  • HasConversion no longer supports captured Object in EF Core 9, when using projection #34956
  • `AlterColumn` not generating SQL for non-nullable constraint #34955
  • Missing `_ord` column when translating an inline collection into a queryable SQL VALUES expression #34954
  • `NonRetryingExecutionStrategy` does not set `ExecutionStrategy.Current` and is ignored. #34953
    Backlog

Closed

  • Abstract base type for IMaterializationInterceptor, possibly other interceptor interfaces #34764
  • Generation of Migrations for new Types / Tables differs in the default value generation from existing types #34619

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.12.1 to 1.13.0 #34948
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.44.0 to 3.44.1 #34947
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
